Title: Why Is This Night Different?
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Ron Nyswaner, Charlotte Stoudt (executive story editor)
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Sebastian Koch, Miranda Otto
Plot: Carrie is told who the person that wants her dead is but she doesn't believe it. In order to stay alive Quinn helps Carrie stage her death.
